Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.game

Class GameScene

java.lang.Object
com.example.game.spawn
com.example.game.controller
com.example.game.GameScene
public class GameScene extends controller
GameScene.java The controller class for the whole functions in the board during a game Includes moves, add, spawns, sketching the boards tiles, when the cell reach the number to win, user's score, checking user lose or not, etc.
